turns.speaker: client
turns.text: *Ring* Hi, Kelly! I'd like for you to order me an Iced Black and White Mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! May I ask the specific location of this Starbucks? There are many of them nearby.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the Starbucks at 4010 Monroeville Boulevard in Monroeville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it! Now, I need you to specify a few things for me regarding your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Understood. What would you like me to specify, Kelly?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size coffee would you like? There are four options: Short, Tall, Grande and Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like my coffee to be a Grande, please. Anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. What kind of milk would you like in your coffee, sir?: 2%, Almond, Coconut, Nonfat, Whole Milk, or Soy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would prefer 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir! Let me just write that down in my notes. A few more questions, sir.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem, Kelly. Ask anything you need.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any special toppings on your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of choices do I have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whipped cream and extra shots of flavor.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like my coffee with whipped cream, please. No extra shots.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir. I'm starting the process of entering the details of your order on Starbuck's website.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for your help, Kelly. Is that all the information you need from me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir, that will be all. I'm completing your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much, Kelly! I really need the energy boost and I'm sure this coffee will help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pleasure is all mine! Your order has been completed. The Grande Iced Black and White Moche with Whipped Cream and 2% Milk will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes at the Starbucks on 4010 Monroeville Boulevard in Monroeville. I will send a receipt for your order to your phone in a text message momentarily.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, Kelly. That will be all. Thank you again for all of your hard work! Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye sir.
